title: Retro
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Beer/Wine, European, Polish, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Coffee, cakes, and sandwiches cafe that's vegetarian except for fish. Has soy and almond milk for coffee drinks, house-made cakes, vegan desserts, sandwiches with sourdough bread, granola with soy or almond milk and raspberry. In the evenings cocktails and Hungarian wine.
